Topic.Title: Wish these topics could be identified by platform... Quest, Squiffy, other

Posts.EditableText:
Just a note to the Libraries and Code Samples admin... for the sake of users' time efficiency, I wish there was a way that messages here could be visually flagged as to the relevant target platform each message is addressing.  Being, for instance, a Squiffy user, I often find the many Quest-specific inquiries cumbersome to muddle through... though their content is certainly important to Quest users, no doubt.

You get the idea.  Wish list item.

Thanks.

Posts.EditableText: As far as I know, no one has ever submitted anything other than Quest related posts to this forum (though I guess it would make sense to flag it as such).
